name: @wikipathways/cxsd
description: Streaming XSD parser and XML parser generator with TypeScript output

scripts.prepare: ALLE_DIR='../../../../'; if [ ! -d ./node_modules ] && [ -d "$ALLE_DIR"/node_modules ]; then echo 'Alle configuration detected. Testing from the top-level alle directory...' && (cd "$ALLE_DIR" && npm run '@wikipathways/cxsd:build'); else npm run build; fi
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm i --package-lock-only && ALLE_DIR='../../../../'; if [ ! -d ./node_modules ] && [ -d "$ALLE_DIR"/node_modules ]; then echo 'Alle configuration detected. Testing from the top-level alle directory...' && (cd "$ALLE_DIR" && npm run '@wikipathways/cxsd:test'); else npm run test; fi
scripts.postpublish: TAG="v$(jq -r .version package.json)" && git commit -am "Bumped to version $TAG" && git tag -a $TAG -m "Published version $TAG" && git push origin $TAG
scripts.test: npm-run-all --silent test:* # In case of error, remove --silent to debug.
scripts.test:build:clean: mkdir -p cache && rm -rf cache && cd test && mkdir -p cache && rm -rf cache && mkdir -p xmlns && rm -rf xmlns && cd ..

author: Juha JÃ¤rvi
